(Icedemon...no offense, but do you pay any attention when you read?  
Shockwave is in a huge forest deep under the cover of a canopy of branches 
and leaves.  Now, if you mean Soundwave is in a cave, but Shockwave isn't)


Smokescreen/Beachcomber:



Smokescreen and Beachcomber saluted Iron Raptor.


<All non-damaged Maximals, or all who don't need repairs, meet outside of the 
Ark for orders.  By order of Iron Raptor, we need to get things moving quick 
before someone slaughters us with an attack>
